U

Updatable - Interface in base.crud
For the Menu and Promo classes to allow the user to update a menu or promotion item.
update() - Method in interface base.crud.Updatable
Updates a menu or promotion object.
update() - Method in class menu.MenuUI
Prompts the user to enter the ID of the menu item to be updated and saves the changes in the menu file.
update() - Method in class promo.PromoUI
Prompts the user to enter the ID of the promotion item to be updated and saves the changes in the promotion file.
UPDATE - base.crud.Action
Updates a Menu or Promo object.
updateMenu(int, String, String, String, MenuType) - Static method in class menu.MenuController
Updates a menu item and saves it in the menu file.
updatePromoInfo(int, String, String, String) - Static method in class promo.PromoController
Updates a promotion item and saves it in the promotion file.
utility - package utility
